Changelog
=========

0.3 (2010-05-17)
----------------

- don't fail when installing on sites w/o kupu (plone4 compatibility)
  [fRiSi]

0.2 (2010-01-03)
----------------

- Fixed wrong kupu styles

- Added iFrame support (use 'prettyPhoto Iframe Link' for external sites)


0.1 (2009-12-29)
---------------

- Initial release
